attributes.action: Build a pool school for a Miss Karen Jackson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I Steven Edwards demand that the Prime Minister builds a pool school in South Shields so Karen Jackson can improve her pool.The school will teach Karen the basic elements of the game such as,holding the cue the right way round,chalking the tip,accepting defeat without using obscene language,teach her to be a lady around the table and to stop her farting when she bends over to take her shot,putting a coin in the slot and pushing a red button and more importantly teach her to put the ball in a hole which is commonly known as pocket.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
